statements: SELECT user_id, activity_timestamp FROM peak_usage_hours_analysis;
SELECT activity_timestamp, user_id FROM peak_usage_hours_analysis;
SELECT user_id FROM peak_usage_hours_analysis WHERE activity_timestamp >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM peak_usage_hours_analysis ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM peak_usage_hours_analysis ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, activity_timestamp FROM peak_usage_hours_analysis WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM peak_usage_hours_analysis WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND EXTRACT(HOUR FROM activity_timestamp) = 10;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, COUNT(*) as count FROM peak_usage_hours_analysis GROUP BY user_id HAVING count > 2 ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT CONCAT(user_id, '-', EXTRACT(MONTH FROM activity_timestamp)) AS user_month, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM peak_usage_hours_analysis GROUP BY user_month ORDER BY total_records DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(DISTINCT EXTRACT(DOW FROM activity_timestamp)) AS unique_days FROM peak_usage_hours_analysis GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY unique_days DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_activity
SELECT user_id, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS activity_count FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id
SELECT user_id, MAX(activity_timestamp) AS latest_activity_time FROM user_activity
SELECT peak_hour, total_users FROM peak_usage_hours WHERE total_users > 100 ORDER BY peak_hour
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT user_id, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10
SELECT MAX(total_users) AS max_users FROM peak_usage_hours
SELECT peak_hour, total_users FROM peak_usage_hours ORDER BY total_users DESC, peak_hour
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_profile WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profile WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM user_activity ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 5 AND activity_type = 'login' ORDER BY activity_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM peak_hours WHERE total_users_online > 100 ORDER BY peak_start_time ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profile WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, registration_timestamp FROM user_profile ORDER BY registration_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'login' AND user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, count(activity_id) AS total_activities FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_activities DESC;

SELECT username, email FROM user_profile JOIN user_activity ON user_profile.user_id = user_activity.user_id WHERE user_activity.activity_type = 'post' AND user_activity.activity_timestamp > '2023-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, activity_timestamp FROM peak_hours_users;
SELECT * FROM peak_hours_activities WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT activity_name, activity_type, user_id FROM peak_hours_activities ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM peak_hours_analysis WHERE analysis_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT user_id, peak_usage_time FROM peak_hours_analysis WHERE peak_usage_time > '2022-01-01 12:00:00';
SELECT * FROM peak_hours_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Sports' ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;

SELECT user_id, username, activity_name FROM peak_hours_users JOIN peak_hours_activities ON peak_hours_users.user_id = peak_hours_activities.user_id WHERE peak_hours_activities.activity_type = 'Exercise' AND peak_hours_users.username LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY peak_hours_activities.activity_timestamp ASC;
SELECT activity_name, activity_type, user_id, activity_timestamp FROM peak_hours_activities WHERE user_id = 25 ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;

SELECT DISTINCT username FROM peak_hours_users JOIN peak_hours_activities ON peak_hours_users.user_id = peak_hours_activities.user_id WHERE peak_hours_activities.activity_type = 'Work' AND peak_hours_activities.activity_timestamp < NOW();
SELECT user_id, COUNT(user_id) AS activity_count FROM peak_hours_activities GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(user_id) > 2 ORDER BY activity_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, activity_timestamp FROM users ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, device_type FROM devices WHERE last_used < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM login_sessions WHERE session_start >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY session_start DESC;
SELECT username, action_type FROM users JOIN actions ON users.user_id = actions.user_id WHERE action_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT device_type FROM devices WHERE last_used < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY device_id;

SELECT u.username, p.page_id, a.action_type FROM users u JOIN page_views p ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN actions a ON u.user_id = a.user_id WHERE u.username LIKE 'A%' OR u.username LIKE 'B%' ORDER BY u.username ASC, p.view_timestamp DESC;
